general: Mars brings a wave of activity to your day, dear Gemini, flooding you with opportunities, blessings, and a sense of urgency. A promising turning point in events stirs excitement, but haste could hinder your ability to make informed decisions. While you are not afraid to learn from your mistakes, a little reflection could save you from course corrections later. Fortunately, your intuition strengthens as the full moon in Leo approaches. Pay attention to the synchronicities that will mark your day and maintain an open dialogue with your intuition. Seeking guidance from another dimension could be the key to unlocking new horizons.
love: Take the time to listen to your partner before reacting.
work: Do not be swept away by urgency; think before you act.
health: Listen to your body and rest if necessary.
advice: Patience is your best ally today.
teaser: Opportunities and intuition, stay attentive today!
